title: The 'Amara' Kangan: A Ruby and Diamond Statement Bangle
materials: set with a central oval-cut Ruby (approximately 3 carats)
surrounded by meticulously placed brilliant-cut Diamonds (SI1 clarity

features: Features an intricate filigree design, reminiscent of traditional South Indian 'vanki' patterns. The central Ruby is bezel-set, providing both security and emphasizing its rich color. Additional smaller Rubies accent the band. The openwork design adds a modern touch to this classic piece.
colors: Predominantly Gold with vibrant Ruby red and sparkling White Diamonds.
occasions: and other special celebrations. This statement piece is also suitable for high-end social gatherings and cultural events.
description: This 'Amara' Kangan is a stunning fusion of traditional South Indian design and modern elegance. The hand-picked Ruby radiates passion, while the brilliant Diamonds provide unmatched sparkle. Its robust construction ensures it will be cherished for generations, making it an ideal heirloom piece (Sampadhanam).
